Methods

RegisterAllCreatureFood(CreatureAsset, string, string, Sprite, string, string, Sprite, EdibleData, VFXFabricatingData)

The fastest way to create a cooked AND cured variant of the given creature. Automatically assigns the Analysis Tech so it is unlocked with the creature.

public static CookedCreatureHandler.CookedAndCuredPrefabs RegisterAllCreatureFood(CreatureAsset creature, string cookedName, string cookedDescription, Sprite cookedSprite, string curedName, string curedDescription, Sprite curedSprite, EdibleData cookedData, VFXFabricatingData vfxFabricatingSettings = null)

Parameters

creature CreatureAsset

The original uncooked creature. MUST have been registered already.

cookedName string

Name of the cooked fish item.

cookedDescription string

Description of the cooked fish item.

cookedSprite Sprite

Icon of the cooked fish item.

curedName string

Name of the cured fish item.

curedDescription string

Description of the cured fish item.

curedSprite Sprite

Icon of the cured fish item.

cookedData EdibleData

Food values of the cooked, which will automatically determine the cured values.

vfxFabricatingSettings VFXFabricatingData

Fabricator settings. If not assigned, automatic values will be determined. Do NOT rely on those being perfect.

Returns

CookedCreatureHandler.CookedAndCuredPrefabs

RegisterCookedFish(CreatureAsset, string, string, EdibleData, VFXFabricatingData)

Simple method to create a cooked variant of the given creature.

public static PrefabInfo RegisterCookedFish(CreatureAsset creature, string name, string description, EdibleData cookedData, VFXFabricatingData vfxFabricatingSettings = null)

Parameters

creature CreatureAsset

The original uncooked creature. MUST have been registered already.

name string

Name of the cooked fish item.

description string

Description of the cooked fish item.

cookedData EdibleData

Food values.

vfxFabricatingSettings VFXFabricatingData

Fabricator settings. If not assigned, automatic values will be determined. Do NOT rely on those being perfect.

Returns

PrefabInfo

RegisterCuredFish(CreatureAsset, string, string, float, VFXFabricatingData)

Simple method to create a cured variant of the given creature.

public static PrefabInfo RegisterCuredFish(CreatureAsset creature, string name, string description, float foodValue, VFXFabricatingData vfxFabricatingSettings = null)

Parameters

creature CreatureAsset

The original uncooked creature. MUST have been registered already.

name string

Name of the cured fish item.

description string

Description of the cured fish item.

foodValue float

Food value of the food.

vfxFabricatingSettings VFXFabricatingData

Fabricator settings. If not assigned, automatic values will be determined. Do NOT rely on those being perfect.

Returns

PrefabInfo

RegisterEdibleVariant(PrefabInfo, GameObject, EdibleData, RecipeData, string[], TechCategory, VFXFabricatingData)

Advanced method to create a cooked/cured creature.
